sentences.en: A small sign was attached to the wall with peeling Sellotape.
sentences.cn: 一个小标志被双面胶粘在墙上。

sentences.en: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.cn: 这个旋钮只是用透明胶带固定住的.

words.tran_cn: 透明胶带，塑料胶带（商标名称）

trans.tran_en: Sellotape is a clear sticky tape that you use to stick paper or card together or onto a wall
